pullRequest.body:
Add deprecated aliases for all the lemmas removed in #9095 and fix a few renames that were botched.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->
See https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Renaming.20monotonicity.20of.20powers.20lemmas

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: LGTM but I don't know how to verify that all aliases are there.
You could check the list from the description of #9095 one by one. I copy-pasted it to get the aliases.

Let's get it merged
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7322992434/job/19945121138)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7322992434/job/19945121096)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7322992434/job/19945121238)
These don't look like deprecations to me; can you split them to their own PR?
Those lemma renames were announced in #9095. I just messed up when doing so.

```suggestion
Those lemmas have been deprecated on 2023-12-23.
```

I think you might actually need
```suggestion
@[deprecated pow_le_pow_left'] alias pow_le_pow_of_le_left' := pow_le_pow_left'
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: Deprecate pow monotonicity lemmas
